posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 手动部署T版openstack
posts.text: 说明该文档用于手动部署OpenStack Train版，可用于搭建自己的测试开发环境，同时可以根据该文档了解OpenStack的架构和相关服务功能及## 配置无特殊需求推荐allinone部署，也支持多节点部署环境信息这里以部署allinone环境为例，既是控制节点，又是计算节点，又是存储节点。allinone环境推荐配置： 16核 32G # hostname test01 # cat /etc/redhat-release CentOS Linux release 7.8.2003 (Core) # lscpu | grep On-line On-line CPU(s) list: 0-15 # lsmem | grep "Total online memory" Total online memory: 32G # ip a 1: lo: <LOOPBACK,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 65536 qdisc noqueue state UNKNOWN group default qlen 1000 link/loopback 00:00:00:00:00:00 brd 00:00:00:00:00:00 inet 127.0.0.1/8 scope host lo valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever 2: eth0: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1500 qdisc pfifo_fast state UP group default qlen 1000 link/ether fa:16:3d:2c:6c:55 brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff inet 10.249.104.7/22 brd 10.249.107.255 scope global eth0 valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever # lsblk NAME MAJ:MIN RM SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINT sda 8:0 0 100G 0 disk sda1 8:1 0 100G 0 part / sdb 8:16 0 100G 0 disk 前期准备openstack repo源由于openstack的官方源和内网连接较慢，这里建议所有节点添加openstack repo源文件,具体的repo文件网上有很多大家可以自己去搜索。 安装OpenStack packages# yum -y upgrade # yum install -y openstack-selinux # yum install -y python-openstackclient 服务安装 & 配置控制节点部署 mariadb# mariadb yum install -y mariadb mariadb-server python2-PyMySQL # vim /etc/my.cnf.d/openstack.cnf [mysqld] bind-address = 10.249.104.7 default-storage-engine = innodb innodb_file_per_table = on max_connections = 4096 collation-server = utf8_general_ci character-set-server = utf8 # systemctl enable mariadb.service # systemctl start mariadb.service # root root/root mysql_secure_installation mysql -uroot -proot > GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'root'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'root'; > flush privileges; 部署 rabbimq-server
